column5: Wow....so more news coverage.... CP24 filmed some footage in Vaughan early this morning and you could see me standing at the scene talking with my partner.....I was the guy with the booklet in his hands lol...another 2 tenths of a seconds fame lol  stay safe out there guys  dave

wow they truly are 'everywhere'  my claim to fame also came thanks to citytv.. back in the 80s, an apt building garage went up in flames, and as the camera crew were filming, i decided to ride my bike into the shot and do a "bunny-hop".  they weren't impressed but my buddies later that night were.
Wow, you're really becoming a celeb. Sorry to hear you have to work on this last long weekend of the summer, but thanks for keeping our highways safe.
